about.aboutParagraph: My work ethic as a programmer is characterized by dedication, discipline, and a passion for continuous improvement. I approach every project with a strong sense of responsibility, always striving to meet deadlines and exceed expectations. I firmly believe in the importance of thorough planning and organization, which helps me streamline my work process and maintain a high level of productivity

resume.description: Computer Networking - Wired and Wireless Networks and Protocols

projects.projDisc: This is a mini E-commerce store selling Gaming consoles and Laptops. It was coded using Bootstrap, VueJS, CSS, and Html in the frontend, as well as Mysql databases for the backend

This is my first portfolio. It was coded using CSS and Html
This is a mini E-commerce store of a gaming company. It was coded using Bootstrap, CSS, and Html

review.persComment: Jodie is a creative, hard-working, and well-behaved individual who always prioritizes his work. He excels in collaborating with others and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap, including Git and GitHub.

I highly recommend Jodie Smith as a software developer. His technical expertise, commitment to quality, and strong communication skills make him an asset to any team. I look forward to the opportunity to work with him again in the future.
Jodie Smith is an invigorating individual. His work ethic is second to none. He is dedicated, talented, and in a class of his own. I look forward to collaborating with him again in the future.

When I met Jodie Smith, it immediately became apparent that he has a history with computers. In the short span of 3 days, he unknowingly took me to heights I never knew existed. However, even though he's quite competent, he never misses an opportunity to better himself. Truly one of the most intellectual and humble men you will ever meet. What a privilege it has been to work alongside him.

Jodie Smith is an extraordinary full-stack developer whose technical prowess is matched only by her unwavering dedication to excellence. His ability to seamlessly navigate complex coding challenges and deliver elegant solutions is truly commendable. Beyond his technical brilliance, Jodie's collaborative spirit and infectious enthusiasm make him not just a valued colleague but also a cherished friend in the world of software development.
Jodie Smith is a dedicated person and does his best on each and every project that gets handed to him. He has an amazing personality and conducts himself very professionally.
